parts.text: {"word":"deflatable","priority":"★☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"空気またはガスを抜くことができる、空気を抜ける","english_definition":"capable of being deflated; designed to be emptied of air or gas.","examples":[{"sentence":"a deflatable mattress","translation":"空気を入れて膨らませるマットレス"},{"sentence":"deflatable beach toys","translation":"空気を入れて膨らませるビーチのおもちゃ"}],"collocations":["deflatable boat","deflatable pool","deflatable kayak","deflatable furniture"],"synonyms":["inflatable (when referring to the opposite property)"],"antonyms":["inflatable"],"related_words":["inflate","deflate","deflation"],"level_frequency":{"frequency_google_ngram":"Low Frequency","CEFR":"B2"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"The word 'deflatable' describes items that are designed to be filled with air or gas and then emptied for storage or transport. It is the opposite of 'inflatable'.","priority":"★★☆"}],"etymology":{"value":"Derived from 'deflate' + '-able'.","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/dɪˈfleɪtəbəl/","syllables":"de-flat-a-ble"},"inflection":{},"common_mistakes":{},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The deflatable raft was easy to pack for the camping trip.","translation":"空気を入れて膨らませるいかだは、キャンプ旅行に簡単に詰めることができた。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"空気またはガスを抜くことができる"},{"sentence":"We bought a deflatable swimming pool for the kids to use in the backyard.","translation":"裏庭で子供たちが使うために、空気を入れて膨らませるスイミングプールを買った。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"空気またはガスを抜くことができる"}]}
